Header: Rio 2016 Olympic Games: Women’s football kicks off proceedings
Content: The Rio 2016 Olympic Games got underway (two days prior to its official opening ceremony) with the Women’s football tournament kicking off. Sweden managed to outdo South Africa 1-0, while host nation Brazil beat China 3-0. Canada beat Australia 2-0. Germany managed to thrash their opponents 6-1 against Zimbabwe while USA beat New Zealand 2-0.
